channel.title: Original toonami
channel.description:
you kids are probably too young to remember any of these shows, but here you go: http://www.toonamiaftermath.com
it's a 24/7 stream of classic toonami lineups - take a look at the schedule etc. they've even got the bumps.

item.title: Original toonami
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:1, topic:438585”]you kids are probably too young to remember any of these shows, but here you go:

toonamiaftermath.com

Toonami Aftermath | Space is the Place

Toonami Aftermath - An oldschool Toonami fan site dedicated to preserving programming that doesnt exist anymore. What is Toonami? Toonami was an influential block of action-adventure cartoons and anime that premiered in 1997.

it’s a 24/7 stream of classic toonami lineups - take a look at the schedule etc. they’ve even got the bumps.[/quote]
I’m 14 and I still remember most of those shows

Read full topic

item.title: Original toonami
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

The thing that pisses me off about Kai is they never get passed the first saga. It’s really gay. Nevertheless, I have gone to other sites and watched all the way up to Buu.

Read full topic

item.title: Original toonami
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:42, topic:438585”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541294.msg3969342#msg3969342 date=1334014930]

Dragonball was like the main thing I would watch, tbh, I don’t see it on tv much anymore, and after toonami went, I can’t remember the last time I watched tv…

i see db kai on all the time.

Where!?

Nickelodeon.

Unfortunately, they changed up the voices and it’s a lot more censored, but they revamped the coloring so it’s a lot cleaner and less grainy.

Well…

I never knew this o.O

dont watch the TV version

They messed it up that bad?

it’s just not the original.
[/quote]
no, the TV version is edited out the fuck. i like kai a lot more than the original because it’s true to the manga.[/quote]
ooo ic

Read full topic

[/quote]
it’s just not the original.[/quote]

item.title: Original toonami
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I remember watching it in 1st grade waking up at 6:30 am was always on. I loved the story line/idea and created some gundam lego things. In one of the episodes the main character realizes the person he has a crush on is actually his sister, I wonder if they got that from star wars.

Read full topic
